resources.string:
Spent some time this afternoon trying to make progress getting @cryptix's go sbot + #patchql going on #android 
I hit a small milestone just now: with the server running on android publish a few contact messages and a few posts using the go ssb client on my computer got patchql to parse the go server offset file and I can see those messages in the sql db.
 (!!!) 
This is very cool and it also feels like there's a hell of a lot to do to get this usable. 
I'm dealing with a few bugs / crashes / etc, and I need to do a bunch of stuff manually to make this work. 
cc @Luandro @mixmix @Maui @dino∆ßùî∏‚ìä·ñá
